::Prowl::

Prowl clenches his teeth as Iron Raptor slides her hand around him, 
increasing the pain slightly but comforting him with her presence. He returns 
her look of love with one of the same love, all his systems wanting to kiss 
her, but the pain in his side restraining him.

With a sigh, he sets off after her, slightly growling as his broken ribs 
scratch aganst internal circitry, sending more pain through his systems. He 
follows her to the Ark,  grinning weakly at her comment.

"I could 'handle it'," he says when they near the CR chambers, kissing her on 
the cheek and ignoring the pain it caused in his side. He leans away, nearly 
losing his balance as everything becomes unfocused. Through unfocused optics, 
he sees Shadow Cat walk up. He stumbles back a few steps, his hand leaving 
Iron Raptor's and his other hand grabbing onto a wall to steady himself.

"Warning," his internal computer's voice sounds in his head, "Major internal 
system damage. Iminent system shutdown."

He growls under his breath. That would explain the dizziness. But how are his 
internal systems now damaged when, seconds before, he only had some broken 
ribs and a cracked wing?

With some silent commands, he orders his computer to bring up a chart of his 
damage. In front of the unfocused view of the room on his optic sensors, a 
clear chart apears, showing red around his ribs. Prowl growls. His broken 
ribs must have destroyed the internal circitry in his side, damaging the 
systems and causing them to malfunction.

Prowl takes a staggering step forward towards the CR chambers, almost yelling 
out as his ribs dig into his side. With a hissing noice and a loud pop, smoke 
begins to emerge from his side, going through the spaces in between the 
fingers of the hand that he quickly brings up to press against his side. His 
spark cavity opens, the TM2 spark releasing repair coils to his damage side 
as he slumps down to the floor, almost going unconscious.
